statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.ProductID , AA.AttributeTypeID , AA.AttributeID , AA.AttributeName
FROM dbo.TProductAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ProductID = #ProductID# ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TProductAttribute AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TProductAttribute ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, ProductID, AttributeTypeID, AttributeID, AttributeName ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #ProductID#, #AttributeTypeID#, #AttributeID#, #AttributeName# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TProductAttribute SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, ProductID = #ProductID# , AttributeTypeID = #AttributeTypeID# , AttributeID = #AttributeID# , AttributeName = #AttributeName# WHERE ID = #ID#
